name: Siege Showdown
description:
"Siege Showdown" is an exciting strategy game that will give you the opportunity to defend a majestic fortress and fight with the troops of your opponents in a battle for power and territory. An exciting fantasy era world awaits you, where magic and powerful warriors merge in one battle.
You have to place your troops on the battlefield with skill and tactics. Choose a location for the placement of military units in order to best resist the attacks of opponents.
You will have a wide arsenal of military units at your disposal. Knights in heavy armor, archers with bows, magicians with destructive spells - each unit has its own unique characteristics and abilities.
